data.title: Anthropogenetics. The University of the Basque Country
data.text:
::: GIVEN COURSES

Courses of Dr. Peña are in spanish

Antropogenética (Teoría y prácticas)

Biología Evolutiva del Hombre (Prácticas)

Master en Análisis Forense

::: MAIN RESEARCH GROUP INTERESTS

Genetic heterogeneity and processes of peopling in human populations

Evolutionary implications of the Demographic Transition

The origin and dispersion of neurodegenerative disorders

Frensic Genetics

Edition of Antropo

::: KEY PUBLICATIONS

::: 2008

Peña JA, Alfonso-Sánchez MA, Rodríguez-Martínez AB, de Pancorbo MM (2008) Founder effect and recurrent mutational events in Fatal Familial Insomnia.

Neurogenetics DOI 10.1007/s10048-008-0134-4

Rodríguez-Martínez AB, Alfonso-Sánchez MA, Peña JA, Sánchez-Valle R, Zerr I, Capellari S, Calero M, Zarranz JJ, de Pancorbo MM (2008) Molecular evidence of founder effects of Fatal Familial Insomnia through SNP haplotypes around the D178N mutation

Neurogenetics 9: 109-118

Alfonso-Sánchez MA, Cardoso S, Martínez-Bouzas C, Peña JA , Herrera RJ, Castro A, Fernández-Fernández I, De Pancorbo MM (2008) Mitochondrial DNA Haplogroup Diversity in Basques: A reassessment Based on HVI and HVII Polymorphisms.

American Journal of Human Biology 20: 154-164 pdf

Cardoso S, Alfonso-Sánchez MA, González-Andrade F, Valverde L, Odriozola A, Pérez-Miranda AM, Peña JA, Martínez-Jarreta B, De Pancorbo MM (2008) Mitochondrial DNA in Huaroni (Ecuadorian amerindians): A new variant in haplogroup A2.

Forensic Science International: Genetics Supplement Series

Cardoso S, Etxeberria F, Alfonso-Sánchez MA, Pérez-Miranda AM, Odriozola A,Valverde L, Sarasola E, Peña JA, De Pancorbo MM (2008) Contribution of forensic genetics to the recovery of historic memory of the Spanish Civil War.

Forensic Science International: Genetics Supplement Series

::: 2007

García-Obregón S, Alfonso-Sánchez MA , Pérez-Miranda AM, Pancorbo MM, Peña JA (2007) Polymorphic Alu insertions and the genetic structure of Iberian Basques.

Journal of Human Genetics 52: 317-327 pdf

Gómez-Pérez, L., Alfonso-Sánchez, M.A., Pérez-Miranda, A.M., de Pancorbo, M.M., Peña, J.A., 2007, Utilidad de las inserciones Alu en los estudios de mestizaje

Antropo, 14, 29-36. www.didac.ehu.es/antropo pdf

::: 2006

Peña JA, García-Obregón S, Pérez-Miranda AM, Pancorbo MM, Alfonso-Sánchez MA (2006) Gene flow in the Iberian Peninsula determined from Y-chromosome STR loci

American Journal of Human Biology 18, 532-539 pdf

Fernandez del Pozo V, Alvarez Alvarez M, Fernandez Martinez M, Galdós Alcelay L, Gómez Busto F, Peña JA, Alfonso-Sánchez MA, Zarranz Imirizaldu JJ, Pancorbo MM (2006) Polymorphism in the Cholesterol 24S-Hydroxylase gene (CYP46A1) associated with the APOE3 allele increases the risk of Alzheimer's disease and of mild cognitive impairment progressing to Alzheimer's disease

Dementia and Geriatric Cognitive Disorders 21, 81-87 pdf

Alfonso-Sánchez MA, Martínez-Bouzas C, Castro A, Peña JA, Fernández-Fernández I, Herrera RJ, de Pancorbo MM (2006) Sequence polymorphisms of the mtDNA control region in a human isolate: The Georgians from Swanetia.

Journal of Human Genetics 51, 429-439 pdf

García-Obregón S, Alfonso-Sánchez MA, Pérez-Miranda AM, Vidales C, Arroyo D, Peña JA (2006) Genetic position of Valencia (Spain) in the Mediterranean basin according to ALU insertions

American Journal of Human Biology 18, 187-195 pdf

Fernández-Mestre M, Alfonso-Sánchez MA, Gendzekhadze K, Layrisse Z, Peña JA (2006) Genetic polymorphisms at four STR loci from the HLA region in a Venezuelan population

Journal of Forensic Sciences 51, 703-704 pdf

Pérez-Miranda AM, Alfonso-Sánchez MA, Peña JA, Herrera RJ (2006) Qatari DNA variation at a crossroad of human migrations

Alfonso-Sanchez MA, Peña JA (2005) Effects of consanguinity on pre-reproductive mortality: Does demographic transition matter?

American Journal of Human Biology 17, 773-786 pdf

Journal of Human Genetics 50, 403-414 pdf

Pérez-Miranda AM, Alfonso-Sánchez MA, Peña A, de Pancorbo MM, Herrera MJ (2005) Genetic polymorphism at 13 STR loci in autochthonous basques from Alava province (Spain).

Journal of biosocial Science 37, 163-174 pdf

::: 2004

Peña, J.A., Alfonso-Sánchez, M.A., Pérez-Miranda, A., García-Obregón, S. (2004) Flujo génico y presiones selectivas en Europa. Una aproximación a partir de clinas de ADN codificante y no codificante.

Pontes ML, Peña JA, Alfonso-Sánchez MA, Abrantes D, Lima G, Pereira MJ, Fernández-Fernández I, Castro A, Pinheiro MF, de Pancorbo MM (2004) Y chromosome STRs in the North of Portugal.

International Congress Series 1261: 350-352 pdf

Lima G, Peña JA, Alfonso-Sánchez MA, Pontes ML, Abrantes D, Pereira MJ, Fernández-Fernández I, Castro A, Pinheiro MF, de Pancorbo MM (2004) Analysis of the HVI and HVII regions of mitochondrial DNA in 100 individuals from North of Portugal.

International Congress Series 1261: 366-368 pdf

::: 2003

Alfonso-Sánchez MA, Peña JA (2003) Tasas de gemelaridad e ilegitimidad en una comunidad rural del País Vasco (Lanciego: 1800-1990).

Antropo, 5, 55-62. http://www.didac.ehu.es/antropo/

Journal of biosocial Science, 35:481-497 pdf

Pérez-Miranda A, Alfonso-Sánchez M, Peña JA, Calderón R (2003) HLA-DQA1 polymorphism in autochthonous Basques from Navarre (Spain): Genetic position within European and Mediterranean scopes.

Tissue Antigens, 61:465-474 pdf

Calderón R, Carrión M, Pérez-Miranda A, Peña JA, Dugoujon JM, Crouau-Roy B (2003) Allele variation of DYS19 and Y-alu insertion (yap) polymorphisms in Basques. An insight into the peopling of Europe and Mediterranean space.

Peña JA, Alfonso-Sánchez MA, García-Obregón S, Pérez-Miranda A (2002) Persistencia de actividad lactasa en población residente en el País Vasco.

Antropo, 2:31-39 http://www.didac.ehu.es/antropo/

Peña JA, Calderón R, Pérez-Miranda A, Vidales C, Dugoujon JM, Carrión M and Crouau-Roy B (2002) Microsatellite DNA markers from HLA region (D6S105, D6S265 and TNFA) in autochthonous basques from Northern Navarre (Spain).

American Journal of Human Biology, 14:713-720 pdf

Alfonso-Sánchez MA, Panera V, Peña JA and Calderón R (2002) Demographic and health patterns in a rural community from the Basque area in Spain (1800-1990)

Journal of biosocial Science, 34:541-558 pdf

::: 2001

Alfonso-Sánchez MA, Peña JA, Aresti U and Calderón R (2001) An insight into recent consanguinity within the Basque area in Spain. Effects of autochthony, industrialization and demographic changes.

Annals of Human Biology, 28(5):505-521 pdf

Peña JA (2001) Estructura genética de la población del valle de Orozco (País Vasco, España) a partir de diferentes matrices de migración

Antropo, 0: 1-10 pdf

Vienna A, Peña JA, Mascie-Taylor CGN and Biondi G (2001). The ethnic minorities of Southern Italy and Sicily: Relationships through surnames.

Journal of biosocial Science, 33, 25-31. pdf

::: 1998-2000

Calderón R, Perez-Miranda A, Peña JA, Vidales C, Aresti U, Dugoujon JM (2000) The genetic position of the autochthonous subpopulation of Northern Navarre (Spain) in relation to the other Basque subpopulations. A study based on GM and KM immunoglobulin allotypes.

Dipierri JE, Alfaro E, Peña JA, Constans J, Dugoujon JM (2000) GM, KM immunoglobulin allotypes and other serum genetic markers (HP, GC, PI and TF) among South American populations living at different altitudes (Jujuy Province, Argentina): Admixture estimates.

Human Biology, 72:305-319

Martinez-Labarga C, Rickards O, Scacchi R, Corbo RM, Biondi G, Peña JA, Varas de Vieira C, Guevara A, Mesa MS and de Stefano GF (1999) Genetic population structure of two African-american communities of Esmeraldas (Ecuador).

American Journal of Physical Anthropology, 109:159-174

Calderón R, Peña JA, Delgado J and Morales B (1998) Multiple kinship in two Spanish regions: New model relating multiple and simple consanguinity.

Human Biology, 70:535-561

Calderón R, Vidales C, Peña JA, Perez-Miranda A and Dugoujon JM (1998) Immunoglobulin allotypes (GM and KM) in Basques from Spain: Approach to the origin of the Basque population.

Human Biology, 70:667-698

Papiha SS, Calderón R, Sertedaki A, Peña JA, Zhong Y and Chakraborty R (1998) Study of three hypervariable DNA loci (D1S7; D7S22 and D12S11) in three European populations.

Annals of Human Biology, 25(1):29-41

Mastana SS, Calderon R, Peña JA, Reddy PH, Papiha SS (1998) Anthropology of the Apolipoprotein E (Apo E) gene: Low frequency of Apo E4 allele in basques and in tribal (Baiga) populations of India.

Annals of Human Biology, 25:137-143

García Fernández E, Arrieta A, Riñón M, Maruri N, Arranz MC, Peña JA, García Masdevall MD (1997) Genetic polymorphisms of HLA class I and class II system in the Basque population.

Transplantation Proceedings, 29(8):3707-3709

Peña JA, Morales B and Calderón R (1997) New method for comparing levels of microdifferentiation: application to migration matrices of two populations from the Basque Country (Spain).

Human Biology, 69(3):329-44

Calderón R, Morales B, Peña JA and Delgado J (1995) Sex linked versus autosomal inbreeding coefficient in close consanguineous marriages in the Basque Country and Castille (Spain). Genetic implications.

Journal of biosocial Science, 27:379-391

Human Biology, 65(5):743-70

Calderon R., B. Morales, Y. Lepage, J. Peña y J. Guevara (1993) Typologies migratoires et mariages consanguins: signification demographique et genetique.

Anthropologie et Prehistoire, 104:57- 66

Morales B, JA Peña y R Calderon (1990) Consanguinity structure in a zone of Guadalajara (Spain).

Anthropologiai Kozlemenyek, 32: 39- 47

Peña JA (1988) Marital migration and distribution of surnames in Orozco valley (Basque Country).

Antropologia Portuguesa 5:283-289

::: Research Projects

Subvención para actividades de grupos de investigación consolidados.

Gobierno Vasco

2007-2012

Subvención general al grupo de investigación GIU05/51

Universidad del País Vasco

2006-2008

Un estudio del poblamiento del espacio mediterráneo mediante el análisis con marcadores del DNA mitocondrial y el cromosoma Y en dos poblaciones ibéricas distantes

Ministerio de Ciencia y Tecnología

2002-2005

Flujo génico y deriva en el poblamiento del País Vasco

Universidad del País Vasco

2002-2004

Heterogeneidad genética observada en diferentes marcadores e intensidad de las presiones evolutivas en población vasca

Universidad del País Vasco

1998-2000

Variacion geografica jerarquizada y estructura genetica de la poblacion vasca II

Universidad del Pais Vasco

1998

::: Equipment

- Thermal cyclers (PCR).

- Electrophoresis (Agarose, polyacrylamide).

- Digital gel imaging system.

- Automatic sequencer.

- Unix workstation. Fortran and Java software.

- Microfilm equipment and document management.

Peña Laboratory of Anthropological Genetics The University of the Basque Country Research
